amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of the funds for the Army Corps of Engineers or Department of Homeland Security to plan, develop, or construct the border wall.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-2 to state that none of the funds in this bill for the Army Corps of Engineers or Department of Homeland Security may be used to plan, develop, or construct the border wall.
